response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to propose an offer to make this acquisition more accessible to you. I am offering the product at a special price of $1,400,000. This is a unique opportunity to secure a product that could potentially increase in value over time, aligning well with your investment goals. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1400000}
